text: Kiya (hazrat) yaqoob kay intiqal kay waqt tum mojood thay? Jab unhon ney apni aulad ko kaha kay meray baad tum kiss ki ibadat kero gay? To sab ney jawab diya kayk aap kay mabood ki aur aap kay aaba-o-ajdaad ibrahim (alh-e-salam) aur ismail (alh-e-salam) aur ishaq (alh-e-salam) kay mabood ki jo mabood aik hi hai aur hum ussi kay farmanbardar rahen gay
